```{r}
set.seed(1000)
```

#start cluster H2O
```{r}
h2o.init(nthreads=-1, max_mem_size = "7G")
```

# LOAD DATASET
```{r}
load(file = "~/shared/ds_icu_pm_1")
```


#small dataset to begin tests
```{r}
small_sample<-createDataPartition(y=ds_icu_pm_1$icu_dead_before_28,p=.20,list = FALSE)
ds_small_sample<-ds_icu_pm_1[small_sample,]
```

#training and test datasets
```{r}
small_train<-createDataPartition(y=ds_small_sample$icu_dead_before_28,p=.60,list = FALSE)
ds_small_train<-ds_small_sample[small_train,]
ds_small_test<-ds_small_sample[-small_train,]


full_train<-createDataPartition(y=ds_icu_pm_1$icu_dead_before_28,p=.60,list = FALSE)
ds_train<-ds_icu_pm_1[full_train,]
ds_test<-ds_icu_pm_1[-full_train,]
```


#variables
```{r}
y<-"icu_dead_before_28"
```



#tasks
```{r}

#small dataset

cltask_1 = makeClassifTask(id = "c1", data = ds_small_sample, target = "icu_dead_before_28",positive="X1")


#full dataset


cltask_2 = makeClassifTask(id = "c2", data = ds_icu_pm_1, target = "icu_dead_before_28",positive="X1")

```


#feature selection
```{r}
ctrl = makeFeatSelControlSequential(same.resampling.instance = TRUE,
  impute.val = NULL, method='sffs', alpha = 0.01, beta = -0.001,
  maxit = NA_integer_, max.features = NA_integer_, tune.threshold = TRUE,
  tune.threshold.args = list())
```

```{r}
ctrl
```

#learner
```{r}
lrn<-makeLearner("classif.h2o.glm",predict.type = "prob", par.vals = pars_deeplearning)
```
